column4: I have installed a fresh copy of ubuntu 10.04, but its not detecting my sound card, instead is showing a "dummy output", I tried ubuntu forums and searched the net, but in vain.. Please help!!
I have installed a fresh copy of ubuntu 10.04, but its not detecting my sound card, instead is showing a "dummy output", I tried ubuntu forums and searched the net, but in vain.. Please help!!
what sound card is it?  does "lspci | grep -i audio" show it?  (if it's USB this won't work)
00:1b.0 Audio device: Intel Corporation Cougar Point High Definition Audio Controller (rev 05) 01:00.1 Audio device: nVidia Corporation Device 0bea (rev a1)
